thread.title: Kathleen
thread.title_full: Pool Supplies Superstore reviewed by Kathleen

author: Kathleen
title: Kathleen
text: I bought this spa vacuum because we have quite a few houses being built around us and dust particles get into the pool spa that we can't get out, also in the corner of the steps. My husband loves this thing. He says it works great and is so easy to use. He's hard to please, but this purchase was spot on. I researched many of these type of spa cleaners, but I think I picked the best. We have had it for a few weeks, so I'm hoping we get continued great use from it. The price was excellent, service and shipping quite good.
